alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 30 at 2:09AM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY MORNING ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow possible above 5000 feet. Highest total snow accumulations of up to 8 inches will possible for elevations above 5500 feet with lesser amounts possible down to 5000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph along ridgetop locations. * WHERE...Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
